html:
king of the castle
or worshiper in a temple
chains to the humble
whips to the brutal

crown of the mindless
stigmas of crazy
lazy they're called
power to the fools

glasses to the hawks
truth to the snakes
graves to the wicked
dust to the justfull

law to the powerfull
prison to the weak
poison to the healthy
death to the ill
title: Hornet Jar
